title: Dixon AHGV250F Aluminum Single Hydrant Gate Valve, 2-1/2" NST female x NST male
features: Size: 2-1/2" NST female x 2-1/2" NST male
description: Single hydrant gate valve. Made of Aluminum. Size: 2-1/2" NST female x 2-1/2" NST male. Maximum 175 psi pressure. Pin lug swivel, non-rising stem. Aluminum speed handle, non-metallic seal. Designed to protect fire hydrants from damage that can occur if used for throttling.
